column17:
This blue colour skirt crafted out of cotton material is a perfect pick for a cool summery look. The frothy layers of tulle skirt in a scottish look is sure to take you back to school days.

Features

  • Pattern: Solid
  • Colour: Blue
  • Length: Hits above the knee

Team it witha top in solid pattern and a pair of classic pumps to add a glamorous look to your wardrobe.

Wash & care

Do not soak tumble dry or bleach

Line dry
